description: 5 essential AlphaFold Server jobs for SARS-CoV-2 p-adic predictions validation

jobs.name: sarscov2_rbd_ace2_wildtype
jobs.purpose: Baseline reference structure for RBD-ACE2 complex

jobs.name: sarscov2_rbd_S439D_ace2
jobs.purpose: Test top phosphoserine mimic - 20% predicted viral shift
jobs.mutations: S->D at position 119 in RBD fragment (AWNS->AWND)

jobs.name: sarscov2_rbd_S440D_ace2
jobs.purpose: Test second phosphoserine mimic - 18.7% predicted viral shift
jobs.mutations: S->D at position 124 in RBD fragment (LDS->LDD)

jobs.name: sarscov2_rbd_Y449D_ace2
jobs.purpose: Test phosphotyrosine mimic - 17.4% predicted viral shift
jobs.mutations: Y->D at position 130 in RBD fragment (NYN->NDN)

jobs.name: sarscov2_rbd_S439D_S440D_ace2
jobs.purpose: Test combined double mutation for synergistic disruption
jobs.mutations: S->D at positions 119 and 124 (both phosphoserine mimics)

expected_outcomes.hypothesis: Phosphoserine mimics (S->D) should disrupt RBD-ACE2 interface geometry
expected_outcomes.validation_metric: iPTM score reduction indicates interface disruption
expected_outcomes.prediction: S439D and double mutant should show largest iPTM reduction

source.key_finding: N439/N440 asparagine doublet is tightest geometric handshake (Poincare distance 0.147-0.195)

upload_instructions.format: JSON array of 5 job objects per AlphaFold Server spec
